かも知れません: (かもしれません) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
かも知んない: (かもしない) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
かや: (かや) - (at sentence-end)  indicates emotion, admiration, etc.
かやかや: (カヤカヤ) - noisily; in a crowd of people talking; clamorously; in a hubbub
かや葺: (かやぶき) - thatch roof; thatching a roof with grass
かゆいところに手が届く: (かゆいところにてがとどく) - to be extremely thorough, focusing on even the finest of details
かゆい所に手が届く: (かゆいところにてがとどく) - to be extremely thorough, focusing on even the finest of details
かゆみ止め: (かゆみどめ) - anti-itch medication; antipruritic drug
かような次第で: (かようなしだいで) - thus; such being the case; in these circumstances
からいうと: (からいえば) - in terms of; from the point of view of
からいえば: (からいえば) - in terms of; from the point of view of
からいって: (からいえば) - in terms of; from the point of view of
からから: (karakara) - ressecado, seco até os ossos; vazio, oco; chacoalhando, tilintando; rindo alto, gargalhando
からきし: (からきり) - quite; utterly; (not) at all; completely; wholly; entirely; totally; altogether
からきり: (からきり) - quite; utterly; (not) at all; completely; wholly; entirely; totally; altogether
からくり人形: (からくりにんぎょう) - mechanical doll; automaton; string puppet; marionette; person who follows orders blindly
からくり時計: (からくりとけい) - automaton clock; marionette clock
からころ: (カランコロン) - clip-clop (esp. of geta)
からして: (からして) - even/for starters; (emphatic form of から) so/therefore; judging from/based on; since/from
からし菜: (カラシナ) - Indian mustard (Brassica juncea); Chinese mustard; leaf mustard; brown mustard; mustard greens
からすの濡れ羽色: (からすのぬればいろ) - glossy black (hair); color of a crow with wet feathers
からすると: (からすると) - judging from; on the basis of; from the point of view of
からす座: (からすざ) - {astron} Corvus (constellation); the Crow; the Raven
からす貝: (カラスガイ) - cockscomb pearl mussel (Cristaria plicata)
からす麦: (エンバク) - wild oat (Avena fatua)/wild oats; (esp. 燕麦) oat (Avena sativa)/oats
からっきし: (karakkishi) - bastante, totalmente, (de) jeito nenhum, completamente, inteiramente, totalmente, absolutamente
からっと: (karatto) - bright and clear (tempo, céu, etc.), perfectly (fine weather); nicely dry (laundry, air, etc.), crisply (fried, cooked, etc.); frankly, open-heartedly
からっ風: (からっかぜ) - cold, strong, dry wind
からという物: (からというもの) - (following te-form of verb, noun, etc.) after; since
からと言うもの: (からというもの) - (following te-form of verb, noun, etc.) after; since
からと言う物: (からというもの) - (following te-form of verb, noun, etc.) after; since
からと言って: (からといって) - while it may be true that; just because; nevertheless; not necessarily
からなる: (からなる) - (for the pattern Y からなる Z) Y adding up to Z; Y making up Z; Y constituting Z; Z consisting of Y; Z composed of Y; Z containing Y
からには: (karaniha) - agora que, já que, contanto que, porque
からみ合う: (からみあう) - to be(come) intertwined; to be entangled
からり: (からり) - clatter (noise made by hard objects coming in contact, e.g. a door flinging open); bright and clear (e.g. sky); nicely dry (e.g. laundry)/crisp (e.g. tempura); cheerful and open-hearted; changing suddenly and completely; completely forgetting something
からんころん: (カランコロン) - clip-clop (esp. of geta)
から揚げ: (カラアゲ) - fried food (most oft. chicken)
から騒ぎ: (からさわぎ) - making a fuss; Much Ado about Nothing (Shakespeare)
かりかり: (かりかり) - crisp (e.g. potato chip, fried fish, etc.)/crunchy; grumpily/touchily/edgily/irritably; scratching
かりゆし: (かりゆし) - happy; auspicious; propitious; joyous; lucky
かりゆしウエア: (かりゆしウエア) - kariyushi shirt; Okinawan dress shirt similar to an aloha shirt
かり子: (かりこ) - maid in an Osaka brothel
かれ草: (かれくさ) - dry grass; dead grass; hay; withered grass
かわいい子ちゃん: (かわいいこちゃん) - popsy; cutie; sweetie
かわいい子には旅をさせよ: (かわいいこにはたびをさせよ) - (proverb) Spare the rod and spoil the child; If you love your children, send them out into the world
かわい子ちゃん: (かわいこちゃん) - popsy; cutie; sweetie
かわゆす: (かわゆす) - (from かわゆいです)  cute!; adorable!
かん: (くわん) - ding; chime (sound of a bell or a small gong)
かんかん: (かんかん) - anger/flare-up; intense heat; clanging noise
かんかん帽: (かんかんぼう) - boater (flat straw hat)
かんかん怒る: (かんかんおこる) - to get very mad
かんかん照り: (かんかんでり) - scorching heat; fierce glare of the sun
かんしゃくを起こす: (かんしゃくをおこす) - to lose one's temper; to throw a tantrum
かんしゃく玉: (かんしゃくだま) - fit of anger/temper/rage; firecracker
かんじき兎: (カンジキウサギ) - snowshoe hare (Lepus americanus); snowshoe rabbit
かんで吐き出すように: (かんではきだすように) - curtly, in a displeased manner
かんで含めるように: (かんでふくめるように) - in an easy-to-understand manner; in a very kind and detailed way
かんの虫: (かんのむし) - convulsions (in a child)/nervousness/short-temperedness; bug thought to cause children's diseases
かんばん: (かんばん) - kanban; kamban; scheduling system for just-in-time production
かんばん方式: (かんばんほうしき) - just-in-time inventory management; JIT
かんむり座: (かんむりざ) - Corona Borealis (constellation); the Northern Crown
かん体細胞: (かんたいさいぼう) - rod cell
かん口令: (かんこうれい) - gag order; gag rule; gag law
かん状: (かんじょう) - rod-shaped; bacillary; bacilliform; baculiform
かん状体: (かんじょうたい) - rod (shape of cell)
か所: (かしょ) - (esp. か所, etc. when a counter) passage; place; point; part
か流: (かりゅう) - swirling current/eddy/whirlpool/vortex/maelstrom; eddy current
か流ファン: (かりゅうファン) - regenerative fan; vortex flow fan
か流ブロワ: (かりゅうブロワ) - regenerative blower; vortex flow blower
